channel.title: CVE Feed for Eaton -- Eaton Intelligent Power Protector (IPP)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Eaton -- Eaton Intelligent Power Protector (IPP)

item.title: CVE-2021-23283|2024-09-17T02:46:39.591Z -- eaton -- eaton%20intelligent%20power%20protector%20%28ipp%29
item.description: Eaton Intelligent Power Protector (IPP) prior to version 1.69 is vulnerable to stored Cross Site Scripting. The vulnerability exists due to insufficient validation of user input and improper encoding of the output for certain resources within the IPP software.
